name: PushUser
description: Used to create or update a user from 3rd party system.
auth_description: Requires a user of type `Employee` or `Api` with functionality `PushUser:None`

headers.name: EVA-User-Agent
headers.description: The user agent that is making these calls. Don't make this specific per device/browser but per application. This should be of the form: `MyFirstUserAgent/1.0.0`

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnitID
headers.description: The ID of the organization unit to run this request in.

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnit-Query
headers.description: The query that selects the organization unit to run this request in.

headers.name: EVA-IDs-Mode
headers.description: The IDs mode to run this request in. Currently only `ExternalIDs` is supported.

headers.name: EVA-IDs-BackendSystemID
headers.description: The ID of the backend system that is used to resolve the IDs.

request_samples.name: CURL
request_samples.sample:
curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "EVA-User-Agent: MyFirstUserAgent/1.0.0" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer <token>" \
  --data '{
  "AccountType": 1,
  "AddressBook": {
    "Addresses": [
      {
        "Address": {
          "Address1": "string",
          "Address2": "string",

        "UseAsDefaultShippingAddress": true

  },

  "CompanyID": "string",

  "CustomFields": [
    {

            }
          ],

          "BoolValue": true,

E.name: Address1
E.description: This string must be between 0 (incl) and 100 (incl) characters long.

E.name: Address2
E.description: This string must be between 0 (incl) and 100 (incl) characters long.

E.name: City
E.description: This string must be between 0 (incl) and 100 (incl) characters long.

E.name: CountryID
E.description:
ISO 3166-1

This is the ID of a `Country`

E.name: CountrySubdivisionID
E.description:
ISO 3166-2

This is the ID of a `CountrySubdivision`

E.name: District
E.description: This string must be between 0 (incl) and 50 (incl) characters long.

E.name: EmailAddress
E.description: This string must be between 0 (incl) and 100 (incl) characters long.

E.name: FirstName
E.description: This string must be between 0 (incl) and 100 (incl) characters long.

E.name: HouseNumber
E.description: This string must be between 0 (incl) and 100 (incl) characters long.

E.name: LastName
E.description: This string must be between 0 (incl) and 100 (incl) characters long.

E.name: PhoneNumber
E.description: This string must be between 0 (incl) and 30 (incl) characters long.

E.name: Region
E.description: This string must be between 0 (incl) and 50 (incl) characters long.

E.name: Remark
E.description: This string must be between 0 (incl) and 1024 (incl) characters long.

E.name: State
E.description: This string must be between 0 (incl) and 64 (incl) characters long.

E.name: Subdistrict
E.description: This string must be between 0 (incl) and 50 (incl) characters long.

E.name: ZipCode
E.description: This string must be between 0 (incl) and 20 (incl) characters long.

D.name: Address
D.description: While this property is not required, if it is sent in the request it must have a valid value.

D.name: BackendID
D.description:
This is the ID of a `AddressBook`

Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

D.name: Description
D.description: Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

D.name: ID
D.description: This is the ID of a `AddressBook`

C.name: ReplaceAll
C.description: If this is set to true, all existing addresses will be removed from the addressbook

G.name: DateTimeValue
G.description: Used for datatype DateTime and Date

G.name: NumberValue
G.description: Used for datatype Integer and Decimal

G.name: StringValue
G.description: Used for datatype String, Text and Enum

F.name: CustomFieldID
F.description:
Identifier for the custom field

This is the ID of a `CustomField`

F.name: DateTimeValue
F.description: Used for datatype DateTime and Date

F.name: NumberValue
F.description: Used for datatype Integer and Decimal

F.name: StringValue
F.description: Used for datatype String, Text and Enum

H.name: SubscriptionID
H.description: This is the ID of a `Subscription`

H.name: UserIdentifier
H.description: Identifier for this user for the given Subscription. P/a: a loyaltyID

J.name: BackendID
J.description: This is the ID of a `Wishlist`

J.name: ProductIDs
J.description: This is the ID of a `Product`

B.name: AccountType
B.description:
Defaults to Standard
Possible values:

* `0` - Standard
* `1` - Basic
* `2` - Incognito

B.name: AddressBook
B.description: With this property the whole address book can be mutated. When used ShippingAddress and BillingAddress will be ignored.

B.name: BackendID
B.description:
ID of the user in the 3rd party system

This string must be between 0 (incl) and 128 (incl) characters long.

B.name: BackendRelationID
B.description: Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: BackendSystemID
B.description:
Code of the 3rd party system that wants to create this user

This string must be between 0 (incl) and 50 (incl) characters long.

B.name: CompanyID
B.description:
Company of the user

This is the ID of a `Company`

B.name: CountryID
B.description:
Country code of the user (ISO 3166-1)

This is the ID of a `Country`

B.name: CustomFields
B.description:
Optional additional custom fields

Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: CustomID
B.description:
This string must be between 0 (incl) and 255 (incl) characters long.

Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: DateOfBirth
B.description: Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: EmailAddress
B.description:
This string must be between 0 (incl) and 100 (incl) characters long.

Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: FirstName
B.description:
This string must be between 0 (incl) and 100 (incl) characters long.

Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: FiscalID
B.description:
This string must be between 0 (incl) and 20 (incl) characters long.

Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: Gender
B.description:
Gender of the user, either M or F

This string must be between 0 (incl) and 1 (incl) characters long.

Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: ID
B.description:
ID of the EVA user

This is the ID of a `User`

B.name: Initials
B.description:
This string must be between 0 (incl) and 20 (incl) characters long.

Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: LanguageID
B.description:
Language code of the user (ISO 639-1)

This is the ID of a `Language`

B.name: LastName
B.description:
This string must be between 0 (incl) and 100 (incl) characters long.

Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: Nickname
B.description:
This string must be between 0 (incl) and 50 (incl) characters long.

Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: PhoneNumber
B.description:
This string must be between 0 (incl) and 30 (incl) characters long.

Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: PreferredStoreID
B.description:
This is the ID of a `OrganizationUnit`

Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: PricingGroupID
B.description: Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: Salutation
B.description:
This string must be between 0 (incl) and 100 (incl) characters long.

Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: SocialSecurityNumber
B.description:
This string must be between 0 (incl) and 128 (incl) characters long.

Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: Subscriptions
B.description:
NOTE THAT Only subscriptions that allow for local storage can be pushed. Subscriptions fully depending on external services cannot be pushed.
NOTE THAT Balance can only be provided for loyalty subscriptions that have a EVA loyalty handler.

B.name: Title
B.description:
This string must be between 0 (incl) and 100 (incl) characters long.

Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: UserType
B.description:
Defaults to Customer
Flags enum, combine any of the below values:

* `0` - None
* `1` - Employee
* `2` - Customer
* `4` - Anonymous
* `8` - Business
* `17` - System
* `64` - Debtor
* `256` - LimitedTrust
* `512` - Tester
* `1024` - RemovedByRequest
* `2048` - Api
* `4096` - Impersonated

B.name: VisibilityGroupID
B.description: This is the ID of a `VisibilityGroup`

L.name: Code
L.description: A unique ID identifying this error.

L.name: Message
L.description: A human-readable message describing the error.

L.name: RequestID
L.description: A unique ID identifying the request. Please provide this ID when contacting support.

L.name: Type
L.description: A short description of the error type.

M.name: ExternalIDs
M.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the resolved external IDs.

M.name: IsAsyncResultAvailable
M.description: This is a flag indicating whether the async request is done. If it is `null`, it is not an async service. If it is `false`, the response is not yet available. Do not process the properties in that case. It is is `true` the properties are filled with the result of the call.

M.name: UnresolvedExternalIDs
M.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the external IDs we couldn't resolve.

K.name: ID
K.description: This is the ID of a `User`
